mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT (car_id, color, milage, REG_DATE, location, special_note, Max_month, price, car_number) VALUES (#{car_id}, #{color}, #{milage}, now(), #{location}, #{special_note}, #{Max_month}, #{price}, #{car_number})
